column3: This is remove usage of 'String.trim()' when checking String for empty(ignoring spaces)

VISTALL,
We already have com.intellij.util.text.StringUtilTest, please add your test to the existing class.

krasa,
We hate org.apache.commons.lang.everything and have no intention of using it in our code if we can help it.
Note that the condition must be <= ' ' rather than ==.
